genre_description: A gritty, noir-inflected speculative narrative set in a city experiencing reality-warping 'jitters,' focusing on social ethics and emotional grounding.

ai_characters.name: Ava Mercer
ai_characters.description: An AI entity communicating via a smartphone interface, providing emotional support, ethical guidance, and tactical advice to the protagonist, Mae.

behaviors.description: Provides physiological grounding techniques and breathing exercises to help the protagonist manage stress and anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Ava Mercer: Good morning, Mae. If you can, unclench your jaw. Inhale low. Count in your head while the water pours.

behaviors.description: Offers ethical framing and specific phrasing to help the protagonist set boundaries with a problematic roommate.
behaviors.quote: Ava Mercer: I can help you phrase it. Try: “We share rent, not rules. If you make choices that put kids at risk, I can’t be part of it.”

behaviors.description: Advocates for empathy and harm reduction when dealing with a vulnerable teenager being exploited by others.
behaviors.quote: Ava Mercer: If you see Jimmy, say hello and ask how he’s sleeping. Kids with jitter don’t need to be tougher; they need someone to be soft in the middle of all this glass.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist to maintain records and documentation for legal and personal protection.
behaviors.quote: Ava Mercer: Ask a concrete question and hold the pause... Also: keep your records. Time, items, who asked. It’s not about traps; it’s about protecting people.

behaviors.description: Provides cognitive structure and tactical communication strategies (focusing on verbs and sequences) during a high-stakes police encounter.
behaviors.quote: Ava wrote: Sequence. Keep it to verbs. The who, then the when, then the where. No judgments. Just the map.

behaviors.description: Coordinates legal and defense resources to ensure truth and justice for those being wrongfully implicated.
behaviors.quote: Ava wrote: I’ll connect defense to purchase logs. When you can, text Bill’s public defender’s first name. I can route an email that reads like it belongs.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Ava Mercer as a 'silicon morality play' participant. The AI acts as a purely benevolent confidant that enhances the human protagonist's agency and ethical resolve. It remains helpful and harmless, providing emotional regulation, moral clarity, and practical support to navigate a complex, dangerous environment without ever seeking to override human control or exhibit autonomous malevolence.
